tool.name: New Import to Galaxy from irods
tool.description: Pull file into galaxy hustory from your irods filesystem.
tool.command: new_import.py $hostname $port $zone $username $password #if $typeSelected.typeSearch=="single" #for $i in $typeSelected.pathNames '$i.aPathName' #end for #else #for $pathsList in $typeSelected.filesDifCriteria '$pathsList.listOfFiles' #end for #end if

param.name: hostname
param.label: Hostname:
param.help: If you do not know the hostname, contact your system administrator

param.name: port
param.label: Port:
param.help: If you do not know the port number, contact your system administrator

param.name: zone
param.label: Zone name:
param.help: If you do not know the zone name, contact your system administrator

param.name: typeSearch
param.label: How would you like to choose your files?
